name: topnpropd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: 3eqtr3g(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1), co(cfv(cts, c0), crest, cfv(cbs, c0)), co(cfv(cts, c1), crest, cfv(cbs, c1)), w0)
stmt.pretty: 3eqtr3g((TopOpen ` c0), (TopOpen ` c1), ((TopSet ` c0)[|`t](Base ` c0)), ((TopSet ` c1)[|`t](Base ` c1)), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(ctopn, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(co(cfv(cts, c0), crest, cfv(cbs, c0)), co(cfv(cts, c1), crest, cfv(cbs, c1))))
-| wceq(co(cfv(cts, c0), crest, cfv(cbs, c0)), cfv(ctopn, c0))
-| wceq(co(cfv(cts, c1), crest, cfv(cbs, c1)), cfv(ctopn, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 →(TopOpen ` c0)=(TopOpen ` c1))
⊣ (w0 →((TopSet ` c0)[|`t](Base ` c0))=((TopSet ` c1)[|`t](Base ` c1)))
⊣ ((TopSet ` c0)[|`t](Base ` c0))=(TopOpen ` c0)
⊣ ((TopSet ` c1)[|`t](Base ` c1))=(TopOpen ` c1)
